name: Snow Blocks
description:
Snow Blocks is an addictive 3D puzzle game where you have to break snow blocks! Your task is to destroy the blocks so that the ice blocks are on the ground! But be careful, there are other rules in the game!

In the game you will find many levels of varying difficulty and various blocks that you have to destroy! Complete the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can make it through this path is up to you!

Game Features:
- Many levels
- Convenient control
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
